member.summary: The configuration class for Http Services

member.summary: Gets the base address.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpSelfHostConfiguration.MaxBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the max buffer.
member.returns: The size of the max buffer.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpSelfHostConfiguration.MaxConcurrentRequests
member.summary: Gets or sets the upper limit of how many concurrent instances can be processed at any given time. The default is 100 times the number of CPU cores.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpSelfHostConfiguration.MaxReceivedMessageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the max received message.
member.returns: The size of the max received message.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpSelfHostConfiguration.OnConfigureBinding(System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding)
member.summary: Called to apply the configuration on the endpoint level.
member.returns: The to use when building the or null if no binding parameters are present.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpSelfHostConfiguration.ServiceCertificate
member.summary: Configure server's certificate

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpSelfHostConfiguration.TransferMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the transfer mode.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpSelfHostConfiguration.UserNamePasswordValidator
member.summary: Gets or sets UserNamePasswordValidator so that it can be used to validate the username and password sent over HTTP or HTTPS

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpSelfHostConfiguration.UseWindowsAuthentication
member.summary: Use this flag to indicate that you want to use windows authentication. This flag can not be used together with UserNamePasswordValidator property since you can either use Windows or Username Password as client credential.
member.returns: set it true if you want to use windows authentication

member.summary: Closes the current instance.
member.returns: A representing the asynchronous close operation.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpSelfHostServer.OpenAsync
member.summary: Opens the current instance.
member.returns: A representing the asynchronous open operation. Once this task completes successfully the server is running.

member.name: F:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpSelfHostServer.SecurityKey
member.summary: Provides a key for the current stored in . Do not change this key as this is being used by WCF.

member.name: T:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding
member.summary: A binding used with endpoints for web services that use strongly-type HTTP request and response messages.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.#ctor(System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBindingSecurityMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the type of security used by the binding explicitly specified.
member.param: The value of that specifies the type of security that is used to configure a service endpoint using the binding.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.CreateBindingElements
member.summary: Returns an ordered collection of binding elements contained in the current binding. (Overrides <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding.CreateBindingElements"> Binding.CreateBindingElements</see>.)
member.returns: An ordered collection of binding elements contained in the current binding.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.EnvelopeVersion
member.summary: Gets the envelope version that is used by endpoints that are configured to use an binding. Always returns .

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.HostNameComparisonMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching the URI.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.MaxBufferPoolSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory allocated for the buffer manager that manages the buffers required by endpoints that use this binding.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.MaxBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory that is allocated for use by the manager of the message buffers that receive messages from the channel.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.MaxReceivedMessageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size for a message that can be processed by the binding.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.Scheme
member.summary: Gets the URI transport scheme for the channels and listeners that are configured with this binding. (Overrides <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding.Scheme"> Binding.Scheme</see>.)

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.Security
member.summary: Gets or sets the security settings used with this binding.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.System#ServiceModel#Channels#IBindingRuntimePreferences#ReceiveSynchronously
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBinding.TransferMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed or buffered (or both) modes of message transfer.

member.name: T:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBindingSecurity
member.summary: Specifies the types of security available to a service endpoint configured to use an binding.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBindingSecurity.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBindingSecurity.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode of security that is used by an endpoint configured to use an binding.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBindingSecurity.Transport
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that contains the transport-level security settings for the binding.

member.name: T:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBindingSecurityMode
member.summary: Defines the modes of security that can be used to configure a service endpoint that uses the .

member.name: F:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBindingSecurityMode.None
member.summary: Indicates no security is used with HTTP requests.

member.name: F:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBindingSecurityMode.Transport
member.summary: Indicates that transport-level security is used with HTTP requests.

member.name: F:System.Web.Http.SelfHost.Channels.HttpBindingSecurityMode.TransportCredentialOnly
member.summary: Indicates that only HTTP-based client authentication is provided.
